message: Let's be fair, Bob. I think this is a good starting point.
Alice, let's split this evenly. A 50/50 split is the fairest and quickest way to end this game.
Bob, I'm willing to be generous, but this needs to be worthwhile for me.  Time is money, and it's depreciating fast!
Alice, this is my final offer. It's a better deal than the last round, considering the inflation. Let's close this out.
